values.description: Slippage is the difference between the fill price you expect for an order and the actual fill price. Modeling slippage makes backtests more realistic.
values.keywords: model slippage, order fill price, Factors Impacting Slippage, order delays, Slow internet connections, long travel distances, sophisticated microsecond arbitrageurs,  set the slippage model, security initializer, security-level reality models, pre-built slippage models
